CREATE TABLE USERS ( user_id INT PRIMARY KEY GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, date_of_birth DATE NOT NULL, phone_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL, address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, password VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE, gender VARCHAR(10), role CHAR(1) NOT NULL, order_id INT )

CREATE TABLE Customers ( customer_id INT(8) PRIMARY KEY, customer_name VARCHAR(50), date_of_birth DATE, phone_number VARCHAR(12), address VARCHAR(100), password VARCHAR(12), email VARCHAR(50), gender VARCHAR(10) )
